citations.narrative:
The licensee is lacking an animal inventory reflecting the currently housed 40 adult and juvenile hedgehogs. Inventory
records allow Animal Care officials to track the animals. A current inventory with all required information must be
maintained for animals on hand, any offspring born on premises, and animals sold or dead.

The licensee is lacking a written contingency plan. Dealers must develop, document, and follow an appropriate plan to
provide for the humane handling, treatment, transportation, housing, and care of their animals in the event of an
emergency or disaster. Not having a written plan could cause delay of help for the animals and could negatively affect
their health and well-being in the case of an emergency or disaster.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1)  Repeat
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
The licensee is lacking an animal inventory reflecting the currently housed 40 adult and juvenile hedgehogs. Inventory 
records allow Animal Care officials to track the animals. A current inventory with all required information must be 
maintained for animals on hand, any offspring born on premises, and animals sold or dead. 
2.134  Repeat
   
Contingency planning. 
The licensee is lacking a written contingency plan. Dealers must develop, document, and follow an appropriate plan to 
provide for the humane handling, treatment, transportation, housing, and care of their animals in the event of an 
emergency or disaster. Not having a written plan could cause delay of help for the animals and could negatively affect 
their health and well-being in the case of an emergency or disaster. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
